name: Surveillance (JosephGallear)
description:
Stay safe, stay in view

Surveillance is a puzzle stealth game where the aim is to reach the end of the level whilst staying in view. You can pick up and move the cameras, but beware of the power outages in the red zones!

This game was created for the Yogscast Game Jam 2021, but due to time constraints I only had 2 days. Bug fixes and new levels may come in the future

Credit to Kevin MacLeod for his song "Babylon" and Nicky Case for inspiration from their game "Nothing to Hide"
